ygData.subject: Re: Cleric/druid neckpiece
ygData.msgSnippet: Quick research gave me this information from everlore.com: The ghasts spawn in Lfay between 12am and 7 am game time. You have to kill skeletons to have the
ygData.messageBody:
Quick research gave me this information from everlore.com:
 
The ghasts spawn in Lfay between 12am and 7 am game time.
You have to kill skeletons to have the Rancourous Ghasts spawn.
Usually the spawns are to the northeast of the obelisk.
Gluck!
Lillihanoj

Date: Sun, 18 Apr 2004 06:18:07 -0700 (PDT)
From: Nick Thompson
Subject: (unknown)

Hey,

I am having a lot of trouble completing a
druid/cleric quest that starts in Felwithe. It is for
the Initiate of Tunare neckpiece, that will eventually
lead me to getting a neck piece that has a mana free
root effect. I am having problems getting the
Rancerous Ghouls to spawn in Lesser Faydark. I have
done all day (real time) camps running around killing
undead, and tracking, but can't seem to get them to
spawn. Any ideas?

Iaeerwen Feywarder
Druid of the 20th Season.
